e7022cb6-3982-471f-8493-cbb6e57a3d0c.title: Untitled
e7022cb6-3982-471f-8493-cbb6e57a3d0c.content:
## Idea List

1. **Personalized Book Discovery Beyond Goodreads**  
   Imagine an agentic-world version of Goodreads: a living, AI-curated reading space. Your lists evolve constantly based on your interests and community, not just static shelves. Reading becomes part of your broader personal knowledge graph.

2. **Cultural Concierge / Spotify Discover for Life**  
   An AI agent that surfaces a personalized feed of local cultural events — art, music, exhibits — and expands naturally to hobbies, restaurants, travel. Life’s enriching experiences, discovered and recommended dynamically.

3. **Independent Brief for Emerging Tech**  
   A curated, personal brief that highlights the most exciting projects on GitHub, cross-referenced with trends from Hacker News, Reddit, Twitter. A way to stay ahead of what’s happening in technology and developer culture.

4. **Showcase Your AI Stack**  
   A personal or team profile that showcases your evolving stack — what tools you’re using and why. Could inspire others, help with hiring, or document your working philosophy. A living artifact of your current way of building.

5. **Personal Website as a Living Feed**  
   Rethink personal websites: make them living, dynamic reflections of what you’re reading, building, thinking about. Update via text messages or conversational interactions with your AI assistant - not by editing static pages.

6. **AI-Generated Reading/Project Journeys**  
   Have an AI help you define and pursue learning journeys: e.g. "Learn Rust", "Understand climate tech". It curates books, articles, courses, GitHub projects — and even connects you to like-minded people along the way.
